# The `FirstIndexOfType` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Find the first index where a type appears in a list of types. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename T, typename... Us&gt;
struct llvm::FirstIndexOfType&lt;T, Us&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Find the first index where a type appears in a list of types.

FirstIndexOfType&lt;T, Us...&gt;::value is the first index of T in Us.

Typically only meaningful when it is otherwise statically known that the type pack has no duplicate types. This should be guaranteed explicitly with static&#95;assert(TypesAreDistinct&lt;Us...&gt;::value).

It is a compile-time error to instantiate when T is not present in Us, i.e. if is&#95;one&#95;of&lt;T, Us...&gt;::value is false.

Definition at line 168 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stlextras-h">STLExtras.h</a>.

</DoxygenPage>
